title: Fantasy Music Collection
description: The Fantasy Music Collection is a suite of 24 orchestral tracks and loops created for fantasy styled adventure games.
longDescription:
The Fantasy Music Collection is a suite of 24 orchestral tracks and loops created for fantasy styled adventure games. The pack includes tracks for exploring open landscapes, dark caves and dungeons, meadows, medieval cities, churches and mead filled taverns. The aim of the Fantasy Music Collection is to provide creative, high quality orchestral game music at a low price.

Listen to the pack at: https://soundcloud.com/john_french/sets/the-fantasy-music-collection

- 20 Professionally mastered original tracks
- Perfect, seamless loops
- 4 bonus tracks

Music for:
- Churches
- Cities
- Towns
- Dungeons
- Combat
- Exploring & Open areas

The Fantasy Music Collection is also available in the Ultimate Game Music Collection (https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/ultimate-game-music-collection), please note some track names may differ.
